EmailTemplate.name: Turbofest London Survey.Survey Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Turbofest London Feedback Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> {{Lead.First Name:default=Good Morning}}: With the Turbofest London dust settled, we ask that you please complete our 1-minute survey, Turbofest London 2015 Satisfaction Survey <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/9WJP2XS> Thanks again for joining us in London, and we look forward to hearing from you soon! Thanks as always, Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
